# isUserInterfaceEnabled

**Instance Property**

Determines if user interface is available for the current request.

## Declaration

```swift
var isUserInterfaceEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `false`, then calls to [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionAuthorizationRequest/presentAuthorizationViewController(completion:)] fail and the system cancels the request.

## Interacting with the User

- **presentAuthorizationViewController(completion:)**: Asks the authorization service to show the extension’s view controller to the user.
